Reviews.Title: “Bed Bug review is False and we can prove it”
Reviews.Author: Jon M
Reviews.Content: We stay at the Caprice Motor Inn all the time and have never had any bad experiances. The Caprice is a older motel but well maintaned and the managers are very helpfull. The people that have writen BED BUGS must have another agenda besides this.

Reviews.Title: “BED BUGS!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Amber C
Reviews.Content: DO NOT STAY HERE!!! BED BUGS!!! This was among the top worst hotels I have ever stayed in. First of all I made reservations two weeks in advance for 3 non smoking rooms, when we get there our room is filthy...literally has not been cleaned with dirty beds and vomit on the floor, it also reaked of smoke. The maids came and cleaned the room apologizing for the mistake. We still refused to stay because the smoke smell was so strong. They moved us to another room that was not as clean as I would have liked but we made due. After getting unpacked I found a dirty pair of socks in the floor that did not belong to us, gross! My grandparents came on Thursday and paid thru Sunday, they had to leave on Friday due to my grandmother getting ill, the front office clerk refused to give them a refund for Saturday night saying the payment already went to the "corporate office". The huge problem was bed bugs, after the second night my husband broke out with bights all over his body, by the third night myself and our children also had bites everywhere. We went to the office and they refused to give us refunds or hear us when we said they had bed bugs. We regretably stayed the fourth night because we had already paid and did not want to spend more money.... This is when I actually felt something in the middle of the night and threw the sheets back to find two bugs... I got my whole family up at 5am and put both the bugs in a ziplock. I went to the office that morning with the bugs and they refused to give us a refund, they also argued with me that they did not in fact have bed bugs!! I tried to get a refund for my grandparents and they told me there was no corporate office and they would refund him by sending a check to him, that remains to be seen as he has not yet recieved it. Also they said they had WIFI, they did in the first building but not in the building we stayed at. As for the breakfast, plain donuts and coffe, THAT WAS IT! Not to mention the fact that it was disgusting. The only good thing about htis hotel was the location and the pool. I would NEVER recommend anyone staying here.

Reviews.Title: “We plan on staying here again.”
Reviews.Author: Elbee417
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased. The hotel is slowly being updated but both pools were beautiful & well maintained. The hot tub was great. The rooms were clean & comfortable. The service was great. Everyone was friendly & very helpful. The price was very affordable. We have paid a lot more to stay in Branson & this was by far a great value.

Reviews.Title: “been coming here 13-years much much much much much better”
Reviews.Author: HYFIVE24
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here for 13-years in a row from the times when it was just a perfect place to stay to the last 2-years when it had fallen off some the people here have always been really nice but weeklys and monthlys brought the old place down the last 2-years. But now they have new managemnet and things are on the up-swing if you like Branson Mo and like to spend your money wisely then the caprice is for you I mean hey its not the ritz but i dont need the ritz at Branson I need a clean room with an indoor pool, hot tub nice people and someone who cares about my stay there even though I only paid $45 to $50 dollars a night before tax I mean really if you have stayed at the caprice and was dissapointed in the past 2-years give it a go again. I'm sure these new people will be able to do more with the place when we all come back and hey we have a stake in this also if the small hotels go away and we all have to pay the big bucks then thats less we have for our families to spend at Branson and enjoy thereselves sure I would love to stay at the raddison but for $125 a night no thanks i"ll take the caprice and show tickets and take my family out to dinner...... okay caprice folks thanks for the great stay and we will be back so keep up the good work because my grandpa had only one saying that stuck with me forever (if it was easy everybody would do it) hope to see alot of families visiting branson this year I will be back in july for more fun see ya at the caprice.....

Reviews.Title: “We'll stay here every time!!!!”
Reviews.Author: JMMH
Reviews.Content: We came to Branson in mid August and someone had told us about the Caprice. We were concerned because it appeared to be older but decided for the price decided to give it a try. It was the best decision we could have ever made! The staff were very friendly and always very helpful. The rooms were always very clean. The indoor pool is beautiful and very well kept. The kids wanted to stay at the hotel all day instead of going out! We will stay here every time we come to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Not the Ritz but great for the price”
Reviews.Author: woodwerkman
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed 3 days and nights at the Caprice. We found it to be a clean place, with an enjoyable indoor pool and spa. We especially loved the indoor pool as the weather had turned to chilly for the outdoor pool. This is an older motel but has been maintained well and is kept comfortably clean. We had no unpleasant issues while staying there and will stay agian. No compaint about the price $99 for 3 nights as advertised on thier marquee. If you want a clean place and don't expect the Taj Mahal, then this is the place for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Really Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: wubby1
Reviews.Content: Just stayed at the Caprice and have to say we were very disappointed. Disappointed in the Caprice and disappointed in the reviews that I read on Tripadvisor that I based my decision to stay here. This place is worn out. The carpet is worn out (my wife did not take off her shoes), the pillow, sheets, comforter are shot. We stayed next door to people who lived there (car up on blocks and decorations in the front window). I was embarassed. I investigated and thought (based on the reviews) that the Caprice would be a good place to stay, I told my party "if the Caprice is rated #27 out of 150 in Branson, I would hate to see the rest". I was not trying to be cheap, I wanted value. I got cheap.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: mmichael171
Reviews.Content: Stayed for three days over a busy weekend in August. We had a two room jacuzzi room (3 adults, 3 kids) and could not complain at all about the rate or the room. Housekeeping did a good job and as hot as it was that weekend, the AC worked great. The breakfast consisted of donuts and toast with juice or coffee. The outdoor pool was nice and well kept. The indoor pool area was fantastic, but there was way too much chlorine in the water. We only went in once though as it was so hot it was more fun outdoors. The parking lot is small and takes some manuevering to get in and out, but there is an access onto Green Mountain out the back which helps you beat the traffic. Overall, it is a basic place to stay with an outstanding price. My kids loved it as we were able to walk across the strip to Pizza, go carts, and ice cream. If you are looking for comfortable, plain and cheap, this is for you. We will definately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Caprice = Family Fun”
Reviews.Author: mkcorn
Reviews.Content: The Caprice is very enjoyable. They have a outdoor pool & indoor pool with hot tub. They have a convinental breakfast. The employees are very pleasant. We have stayed there several times and will continue to stay there. The rates are reasonable and they also have extended stay rates.

Reviews.Title: “Our Favorite In Branson”
Reviews.Author: BlownX
Reviews.Content: Have been coming to Branson for only a few years now and the first time we came we did the "drive up and down, looking for a room thing". After a few stops we ran across the Caprice, just by chance. What a find!!! The staff was really nice and helpful and the rooms, although an older motel, were quite nice. In the past three or four years we have visited Branson probably 5 or 6 times a year and would not stay anywhere else. LOVE IT!! Have gotten offers for rooms at more elegant hotels and we've decided that the Caprice was our place. They always welcome us with open arms and remember who I am whenever I call for reservations. Depending on the season, they even throw us a discount every now and again. If your looking for a room with a very reasonable rate and an awesome breakfast buffet right next door (Starvin Marvin's) give the Caprice a call.

Reviews.Title: “Great Price loved the pool”
Reviews.Author: 3kidstothewind
Reviews.Content: I was traveling with my parents and my two young children. We booked a suite with a separate bedroom. Both rooms attached to the common bathroom. I believe this hotel has a 1 star rating so I was expecting exactly what we had. The furnishing are dated and the bathroom is tiny, but how much room do you need in a bathroom. The parking lot is rough. The hotel has all exterior corridors. My only concern was that the locks on the doors were very basic. I prefer the bar type locks in addition to the deadbolt. The reason I booked this hotel, besides the price, was the indoor pool. The pool was great. Very new and clean. My kids loved it and it was the highlight of their trip. If you go for the pool try to get a room closer to the pool. There are a few different buildings and we were farthest away which is a pain when you are wet. The staff was nice and helpful. There is a restaurant in the parking lot and a couple dessert places within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “We are going back soon”
Reviews.Author: charelmo
Reviews.Content: We visit Branson frequently. We have stayed in about 10 different places and Caprice Motor Inn is our favorite. As far as getting the most for your money, it can't be beat. The staff is always very friendly and accommadating. Everyone from the manager to the maids. It has a wonderful pool and indoor hot tub which is always clean and well maintained. We have stayed there 8 or 10 times and have even had the privilege of meeting the owner. We told him that he runs a good business and has great managers and staff. The rooms are always very clean and they treat you like family there. We are planning on going back there next week.

HotelInfo.Name: Caprice Motor Inn Branson
HotelInfo.Address: 3410 W. 76 Country Music Blvd., Branson, MO 65616
